titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of in the ordinarie visitation of the right reuerende father in God, William lorde bishop of Couentrie and Lichfielde diligently to be considered of as well by ministers, as churchwardens and swornemen, and aduesedly to be answered particulerly to euerie point, by either of them seuerally in writing, at the visitation to bee holden by the saide reuerend father, or his officers.
Visitation articles. 1584
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Lichfield and Coventry. Bishop (1579-1609 : Overton)
Overton, William, 1525?-1609.

notesStmt.note: Caption title (leaf A1 verso) gives date of visitation.

Caption title (leaf A4 recto) reads: Certaine aduertisementes, for a continual order to be obserued inuiolably without any alteration touching the pointes following, within the diocesse of Couentrie and Liehfield [sic]. Register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
